name: The night of the DemoGobron
description:
Plot

You're the DemoGobron living in the Upside Down and you're late to your AlgoNum lesson again, but you forgot your electric scooter (if you know you know). 

Extinguish the fire to light your path, find the door to open the key and not the other way around and fight against Eldritch horrors in the maze that this mad world is.

Controls

This game is better played with headphone.

Move with the directional keys of WASD.
Jump with the space bar.
Interact with E.

If you need to reset, press R to restart the level.

You can see how many fire is required to beat an enemy on top of it's head.

Theme

The theme of this year's Jam was Upside Down and we integrated this theme in different way.

First, we referenced Stranger Things, a famous Netflix series. In this show, the Demogorgon is the bad guy from season 1. In our game, the user plays as this infamous villain. Moreover, the world in which the Demogorgon lives is called the Upside Down in the series.

Then, we added mechanisms to invert the logic like extinguishing the fires to make light

Finally, you have to pick up doors to open keys which is absolutely mind blowing.

Credits

All assets have been made by us, the only exceptions being the background (https://lil-cthulhu.itch.io/pixel-art-cave-background) and the circle around the player and the enemies (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/irregular-circle-ui-animation-163132).

This game was made in 48 hours for the Upsi Jam.
